ThingDef.label: condensed milk
ThingDef.description:
A thick, sweetened dairy product made by reducing milk, commonly used in desserts, baking, or as a long-lasting ingredient for various recipes.

<color=#E5E54C>Trade considerations:</color>

<color=#E5E54C>Ingredients:</color> Making 5 condensed milk requires milk and sugar for a total value of 33.70, and sells for 12, giving a <color=#33CC33>43.83%</color> profit per unit.

<color=#E5E54C>Value per work:</color> Recipe requires 1000 work, which results on a value per work of <color=#33CC33>0.06</color>.

<color=#E5E54C>Caravan trading:</color> Its weight is 0.3 Kg, for a value per Kg of <color=#33CC33>40</color>.

<color=#E5E54C>Profit per day:</color> On average, profit per day is <color=#33CC33>0.24</color> (for reference Yayo is 0.35).
